scripts.zip: zip -r lambda.zip index.js src node_modules package.json package-lock.json .gitignore
scripts.update:faas:dev: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name mxfactorial-graphql-server-dev --zip-file fileb://$(pwd)/lambda.zip --region us-east-2
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:prod
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:dev
scripts.cp:lambda: echo "copying over to terraform" && cp lambda.zip ../terraform/workspaces/lambda.zip
